name: Sword and Staff
description:
Sword and Staff is no longer in development.


Sword and Staff is a retro hack-and-slash dungeoncrawling adventure with survival and crafting elements. Fight your way through a randomly generated overworld and endless dungeons. Craft, enchant, and upgrade hundreds of unique and powerful weapons. Uncover ancient magical artifacts. Defeat challenging bosses and reclaim the legendary Tetragram to restore balance to the world.

I've been working on this game (alone) for over 5 years, so there is plenty of content already there to keep you busy. However, it is still in early Alpha, so there's a lot more to come. If you buy the game now, you'll get all future versions for free! What a deal!


Current features:

  • Four dungeons to explore, each with infinite procedurally generated floors
  • Over 1000 items to collect, including hundreds of unique weapons
  • Over 180 special abilities to upgrade your character for a sense of progression
  • A unique puzzle-based crafting system, and several other minigames
  • A randomly generated overworld full of flora and fauna
  • Build, craft, fight, enchant, mine, farm, tame, cook, paint, and more!
  • Over 100 enchantments to customize your weapons and armor

Upcoming features (subject to change):

  • 12 unique dungeons spread across four islands
  • 16 challenging bosses
  • Multiplayer support
  • Many more enemies and more ways to defeat them
